product_metadata.product_name: Bajaj Life Diabetic Term Plan II Sub 8 HbA1c
product_metadata.plan_type: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Pure Risk Premium Term Plan

product_summary.objective: A term insurance plan designed specifically for Type 2 diabetics and pre-diabetics, offering life cover by factoring in the nuances of diabetic health conditions.
key_highlights: Provides comprehensive financial security to family
Includes Health Management Services through consultations and webinars
Tax benefits as per prevailing laws

medical_definition_note.HbA1c: A blood test showing average blood sugar levels over past 2–3 months

core_benefits.details: On death during the policy term, nominee receives Sum Assured on Death (policy terminates).
core_benefits.sum_assured_on_death_definition: Higher of: (a) 10× Annualised Premium, (b) 105% of Total Premiums Paid, (c) Sum Assured

core_benefits.details: No benefit is payable on survival till maturity since this is a pure term insurance product.

eligibility_and_parameters.premium_payment_term: Regular Pay (Premium Payment Term = Policy Term)

sum_assured_limits.maximum: No Limit (subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy)

eligibility_and_parameters.sum_assured_multiple_rule: Sum Assured selectable in multiples of ₹1,00,000

rebates_and_discounts.salary_rebate: 5% discount on first-year premium for salaried employees

surrender_value.details: No surrender value is available under this plan

health_management_services.availability: Provided if premiums are paid on time
includes: Medical consultation from registered service providers
health_management_services.objective: Helps life assured manage diabetes and improve overall health

sample_illustrations.notes: Premiums include GST, for male non-smoker, annual frequency, excluding underwriting loadings

must_disclose: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions.
Please read the sales brochure, policy document and benefit illustration carefully.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fictitious/fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Income Tax Act and amendments. Consult your tax advisor.
compliance_rules.free_look_period: 30 days free look available from date of policy receipt.
compliance_rules.suicide_exclusion: If death due to suicide within 12 months, nominee receives 80% of Total Premiums Paid.

retrieval_chunks.text: Bajaj Life Diabetic Term Plan II is designed exclusively for Type 2 diabetics (HbA1c ≤ 8) and pre-diabetics.
On death during policy term, nominee receives Sum Assured on Death which is higher of 10× annual premium, 105% of premiums paid, or sum assured.
This is a pure term plan, so no maturity benefit is payable on survival till maturity.
Entry age is 30–60 years, maturity age is 35–75 years, policy term is 5–25 years, minimum sum assured is ₹25 Lakhs.
Includes medical consultation, second opinion, webinars and diabetes health support, provided premiums are paid on time.
Discounts include salary rebate (5%), online rebate (5%), staff rebate (4%), and high sum assured rebate above ₹1 Crore.
